body_html: I didn't measure this, but at the moment I don't have access to anything more powerful than a single 960, so I can't run anything very big. I'll try to see if it changes anything, but I'm afraid that we can't get around this anyway. It should be pretty quick though. Since you made THC cache it, it's only a simple attribute lookup.
